Name: Summer Girl
About the game: A cute little girl joins the desktop of your computer. You can let her keep an eye on your movements. You can get more costumes and motions through interacting with her. She likes the mango-flavored ice bar. Get points and give her an ice bar. Game features *Do not hit the change button continuously. The object may disappear. *Realistic physics are applied to the head, chest and buttocks. *A charming girl lives autonomously on the desktop without burdening the cpu. *The game offers a great variety of options for your convenience.
